title: Pine Labs | Software Engineer | Bangalore
content:
Education: MTech in CSE Tier 1 College
Years of Experience: 1
Prior Experience: Service based company
Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: Pine Labs
Title/Level: Software Engineer
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 16.5LPA
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 1Lakhs
Retention bonus: 5Lakhs 
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 22.5 LPA
Benefits: No other benefits as such.

title: Zepto | SDE 2 | Offer | 4 YOE
content:
Education: B.Tech from Tier 3
Years of Experience: 4
Prior Experience: SDE 2 at Microsoft
Prev Comp - 34 L base + 70 K USD stocks over 4 years equally vested + 20 % bonus = 55.8 LPA

Company: Zepto
Title/Level: SDE 2
Location: Bangalore
Base Salary: 52 LPA
Joining Bonus: 5 L
Stock bonus: 52 L vested equally over 4 years
Relocation: Standard Company assisted move.
Total comp (Base Salary + Bonus + Stock): 52 + 5 + 13 = 70 LPA

General Zepto benefits.

Other offer -  [Meta London](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5839600/Meta-or-E4-or-Offer-or-London-or-4-YOE), [Salesforce SMTS](https://leetcode.com/discuss/compensation/5800642/salesforce-smts-offer-4-yoe/2643773)

title: Google | Fresher | Bengaluru
content:
* Education: CS in Tier-1
* Years of Experience: 0
* Prior Experience: Internship in a product based MNC + 5 month combined full stack intern at 2 startups (1 YC)
* Date of the Offer: 24 Sept
* Company: Google
* Title/Level: Software Engineer L3 (New Grad)
* Location: Bengaluru
* Salary: 21,00,000
* Relocation/Signing Bonus: 3.25 Sign-on bonus / 1.7 Relocation
* Stock bonus: 31000 USD(~26 lakhs) 38% 32% 20% 10% vesting in 4 years
* Bonus: 3,15,000 (20%)
* Retirals : ~1.41 lakhs (PF + Gratuity)
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~56 (First year- 21+3.25+1.7+3.15+10+1.41 = 40.51)
* Benefits: Standard Google benefits
* Other details: I am not sure about the relocation bonus - what I mentioned is what a standard L3 gets.

title: Amazon|SDE-1|Chennai|2024
content:
Education: Undergrad from tier1 college, 2024 grad
Years of Experience: 0 (FT offer revoked as the company laid of %90 of the workforce, company based at Hyd)
Prior Experience: 6 months SDE intern at Amazon Hyd + summer inter at Jio platforms
Date of the Offer: September 2024
Company: Amazon
Title/Level: Software Development Engineer 1 (SDE-1)
Location: Chennai, India
Salary: INR 19,17,000
Relocation: INR 1,50,000
Signing Bonus: INR 6,47,000 (1st year) + 5,18,000 (2nd year)
Stock bonus: INR 15,56,000 (over 4 years) (5% in 1st year)
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock)(1st year): ~ INR 27,91,800
Benefits: Total 15 annual leaves, 12 casual leaves, 12 sick leaves + Medical Insaurance upto INR 5,00,000

Other details: As far as i know, amazon isn't hirirng SDE-1's externally they are offering it to the 2024 grad people who have interned at amazon and got inclined offer at the end of their internship.
